Glacier is surge-type and last surged vigorously in the 1980s. Interpreted to be undergoing a 'slow surge' at the time of temperature measurement | Supporting information in Wilson 2013 (https://doi.org/10.1002/jgrf.20096) and Flowers 2011 (https://doi.org/10.5194/tc-5-299-2011) | latitude/longitude/elevation: Measured with Trimble RTK survey | Central ablation area of small surge-type valley glacier | measurement.depth: Measured at time of installation (2011-07-17) and decreased over time due to glacier thinning
